pred_item.label: CLIN/BPO gel
pred_item.description: Once-daily topical application of clindamycin phosphate 1.2%/benzoyl peroxide 3.1% gel to the face for 12 weeks. Formulated within the same vehicle as IDP-126.
interventionNames: Standardized Skin Care (CeraVe cleanser, moisturizer, sunscreen)

pred_item.label: BPO/ADAP gel
pred_item.description: Once-daily topical application of benzoyl peroxide 3.1%/adapalene 0.15% gel to the face for 12 weeks. Formulated within the same vehicle as IDP-126.
interventionNames: Standardized Skin Care (CeraVe cleanser, moisturizer, sunscreen)

pred_item.label: IDP-126 gel
pred_item.description: Once-daily topical application of clindamycin phosphate 1.2%/benzoyl peroxide 3.1%/adapalene 0.15% gel (IDP-126) to the face for 12 weeks.
interventionNames: Standardized Skin Care (CeraVe cleanser, moisturizer, sunscreen)

pred_item.label: CLIN/ADAP gel
pred_item.description: Once-daily topical application of clindamycin phosphate 1.2%/adapalene 0.15% gel to the face for 12 weeks. Formulated within the same vehicle as IDP-126.
interventionNames: Standardized Skin Care (CeraVe cleanser, moisturizer, sunscreen)

pred_item.label: Vehicle gel
pred_item.description: Once-daily topical application of vehicle gel (same gel formulation without active drugs) to the face for 12 weeks.
interventionNames: Standardized Skin Care (CeraVe cleanser, moisturizer, sunscreen)

pred_item.name: Clindamycin/Benzoyl Peroxide/Adapalene Gel (IDP-126)
pred_item.description: Topical aqueous polymeric gel containing clindamycin phosphate 1.2%, benzoyl peroxide 3.1% (micronized), and adapalene 0.15% (micronized), pH-balanced, alcohol-free, preservative-free, without occlusive agents or surfactants; applied once daily to the face for 12 weeks.

pred_item.name: Benzoyl Peroxide/Adapalene Gel
pred_item.description: Topical gel containing benzoyl peroxide 3.1% (micronized) and adapalene 0.15% (micronized), formulated within the same vehicle as IDP-126; applied once daily to the face for 12 weeks.

pred_item.name: Clindamycin/Benzoyl Peroxide Gel
pred_item.description: Topical gel containing clindamycin phosphate 1.2% and benzoyl peroxide 3.1% (micronized), formulated within the same vehicle as IDP-126; applied once daily to the face for 12 weeks.

pred_item.name: Clindamycin/Adapalene Gel
pred_item.description: Topical gel containing clindamycin phosphate 1.2% and adapalene 0.15% (micronized), formulated within the same vehicle as IDP-126; applied once daily to the face for 12 weeks.

pred_item.name: Vehicle Gel
pred_item.description: Topical vehicle gel matching the IDP-126 formulation but without active drug components; applied once daily to the face for 12 weeks.

ref_item.description: Absolute change from Baseline to Week 12 in mean inflammatory lesion counts

pred_item.measure: Absolute change from baseline in inflammatory lesion count
pred_item.description: Least-squares mean absolute change from baseline in the number of facial inflammatory lesions (pustules, papules, and nodules).

ref_item.description: Absolute change from Baseline to Week 12 in mean non-inflammatory lesion counts

pred_item.measure: Absolute change from baseline in noninflammatory lesion count
pred_item.description: Least-squares mean absolute change from baseline in the number of facial noninflammatory lesions (closed and open comedones).

ref_item.measure: Percentage of Participants With Success on the Evaluator's Global Severity Score
ref_item.description: Success was defined as at least a two grade reduction and clear or almost clear at Week 12. The Evaluator's Global Severity Score has grades for acne severity of 0 (Clear), 1 (Almost Clear), 2 (Mild), 3 (Moderate), and 4 (Severe), with higher scores indicating worse severity.

pred_item.description: Proportion of participants achieving treatment success, defined as a ≥ 2‑grade reduction from baseline in Evaluator’s Global Severity Score (EGSS) and a score of 0 (clear) or 1 (almost clear).

ref_item.measure: Inflammatory Lesion Count Changes at Week 2, 4, and 8
ref_item.description: Absolute change from Baseline to Week 2, 4, and 8 in mean inflammatory lesion counts

pred_item.description: Investigator-assessed local cutaneous reactions including scaling, erythema, hypopigmentation, and hyperpigmentation, each scored on a 4-point scale (0 = none to 3 = severe).

ref_item.measure: Non-inflammatory Lesion Count Changes at Week 2, 4, and 8
ref_item.description: Absolute change from Baseline to Week 2, 4, and 8 in mean non-inflammatory lesion counts

pred_item.description: Change from baseline in Acne-QoL scores across four domains (self-perception, role-emotional, role-social, and acne symptoms); higher scores indicate improved health-related quality of life.

ref_item.measure: Inflammatory Lesion Count Percentage Changes at Week 2, 4, and 8
ref_item.description: Percentage change from Baseline to Week 2, 4, and 8 in mean inflammatory lesion counts

pred_item.measure: Percent change from baseline in inflammatory lesion count by study visit
pred_item.description: Least-squares mean percent change from baseline in facial inflammatory lesion counts at each visit.

ref_item.measure: Non-inflammatory Lesion Count Percentage Changes at Week 2, 4, and 8
ref_item.description: Percentage change from Baseline to Week 2, 4, and 8 in mean non-inflammatory lesion counts

pred_item.measure: Percent change from baseline in noninflammatory lesion count by study visit
pred_item.description: Least-squares mean percent change from baseline in facial noninflammatory lesion counts at each visit.

ref_item.measure: Percentage of Participants With Success on the Evaluator's Global Severity Score at Weeks 2, 4, and 8
ref_item.description: Success was defined as at least a two grade reduction and clear or almost clear at the visit. The Evaluator's Global Severity Score has grades for acne severity of 0 (Clear), 1 (Almost Clear), 2 (Mild), 3 (Moderate), and 4 (Severe), with higher scores indicating worse severity.

pred_item.description: Proportion of participants achieving treatment success (≥ 2‑grade reduction from baseline in EGSS and a score of 0 or 1) at each scheduled visit.

ref_item.measure: Percentage of Participants With Two Grade Success on the Evaluator's Global Severity Score - at Weeks 2, 4, and 8
ref_item.description: Two grade success was defined as at least a two grade reduction. The Evaluator's Global Severity Score has grades for acne severity of 0 (Clear), 1 (Almost Clear), 2 (Mild), 3 (Moderate), and 4 (Severe), with higher scores indicating worse severity.

pred_item.measure: ≥ 2‑grade reduction in EGSS by study visit
pred_item.description: Proportion of participants achieving at least a 2‑grade reduction from baseline in EGSS, regardless of whether a score of 0 or 1 was reached, at each visit.
